alert.note: Alert for North and Northeast Elbert County Below 6000 Feet, North Lincoln County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 8:01PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Lincoln County through 845 PM MDT... At 800 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 4 miles south of Genoa, or 11 miles east of Limon, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hugo, Arriba and Genoa. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: North and Northeast Elbert County Below 6000 Feet, North Lincoln County
